product_name: Outdoor Research Torque T-Shirt - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: When you're working up a sweat in hot sun, the women's Outdoor Research Torque T-Shirt made of Polartec(R) Power Dry(R) wicks and dries fast, so you stay cool. Polartec Power Dry fabric with mesh side panels vents well and offers UPF 15 sun protection. Polygiene(R) active odor control prevents stink. Foldover cuffs protect your hands from sun or chilly temps. Reflective trim on the women's Outdoor Research Torque T-Shirt aids visibility in low light. Closeout.
short_description: When you're working up a sweat in hot sun, the women's Outdoor Research Torque T-Shirt made of Polartec(R) Power Dry(R) wicks and dries fast, so you stay cool.
